title: When tempers flare, nurses' injuries could rise

title_detail.value: When tempers flare, nurses' injuries could rise

summary: A new study has found that when there's an imbalance in support among nurses at work, tempers flare and risk of injuries can go up.

summary_detail.value: A new study has found that when there's an imbalance in support among nurses at work, tempers flare and risk of injuries can go up.
